channel.title: Trade/Duel correct packets. Accept trade/duel works (:
channel.description:
Alright, well i just got bored and decided to start work on a Devolution 7 based server. (The original by Bakatool, not Killamess)
Basically, i noticed that the packets were all mixed up for trading/duelling, which meant that if you requested a duel with someone and they clicked on the "Player1 wishes to duel with you." then it would send a trade request back to that player1, which was so annoying and also this happened on Dodian.
Basically, i just chnged the right-click player option commands, and switched some packets around (and re-done everything to do with duelling at the same time).
But yeah, so heres duelling & trading that works with request accepting... http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=6ye9te&s=4
I'm just bored, so i posted it... Don't flame me like a little fag.
